name: 如果一生只有三十岁Before Thirty
name_original: 如果一生只有三十岁Before Thirty
description:
This is a simulated story game with puzzles.
It tells the story of a young man who knows that he has only ten years to live. He gradually accepts the reality and feels the process of life in confusion and struggle.

When the hero learned that he was suffering from terminal illness, he was confused and helpless. Gradually he started to be inspirational to experience life. What will happen in the hero's life, and what ordinary but profound experiences will be?

The game tells the story with a variety of games.

Some are very simple, just like the life in peace with emotional expression.



Some are little difficult, just like the constant struggle in life, which needs to strive for victory.



We hope that every player will have some insights in the end of the game.


If you have any comments or suggestions, join our QQ group 310126344 to balabala.
